item.title: Meetups
item.description: .card { box-shadow: 0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.2); transition: 0.3s; border-radius: 5px; margin: auto; width: 75%; } .card:hover { box-shadow: 0 8px 16px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.2); } .container { padding: 10px; width: inherit; } .attend { border: none; outline: 0; display: inline-block; padding: 8px; color: white; background-color: #e97d29; text-align: center; cursor: pointer; font-size: 18px; margin: 10px 0px; } Cloud Native Computing Johannesburg (CNCJ) -- -- Mon, 29 June, 6:00PM -- [Kubernetes] A demo of Rancher's RKE -- Online Webinar -- -- -- Attend -- -- -- 2020 [Kubernetes] A demo of Rancher's RKE Mon, 29 June, 6:00PM Online Webinar meetup event link [Kubernetes] Embracing Failure: Lessons learned from 50 post-mortems Tues, 26 May, 6:00PM Online Webinar meetup event link Webinar - Day 2 Operations: Kubernetes Management Thurs, 26 March, 6:00PM Online Webinar meetup event link Webinar - Kubernetes Fundamentals Thurs, 13 February, 6:00PM Online Webinar meetup event link 2019 Why should you consider Kubeflow if you are thinking machine learning?
